verses.verse: 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, who at sundry times <S%G4181><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in divers manners <S%G4187><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5660><s%> in time past <S%G3819><s%> unto the fathers <S%G3962><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>,

Hath <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his Son <S%G5207><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> he hath appointed <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5656><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the worlds <S%G165><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> the brightness <S%G541><s%> of his glory <S%G1391><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the express image <S%G5481><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> person <S%G5287><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> upholding <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5723><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, when he had <S%G4160><s%> <S%G2512><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> purged <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5671><s%> <S%G2512><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, sat down <S%G2523><s%> <S%G5656><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> high <S%G5308><s%>;

Being made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> so much <S%G5118><s%> better than <S%G2909><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%>, as <S%G3745><s%> he hath by inheritance obtained <S%G2816><s%> <S%G5758><s%> a more excellent <S%G1313><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> they <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> unto which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> said he <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, this day <S%G4594><s%> have <S%G1080><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> begotten <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a Son <S%G5207><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> he bringeth in <S%G1521><s%> <S%G5632><s%> the firstbegotten <S%G4416><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%>, he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G4352><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5657><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3303><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, Who maketh <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ministers <S%G3011><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> he saith, Thy <S%G4675><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, is for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>: a sceptre <S%G4464><s%> of righteousness <S%G2118><s%> is the sceptre <S%G4464><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%>.

Thou hast loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G5656><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> <S%G5656><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>; therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, even thy <S%G4675><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, hath anointed <S%G5548><s%> <S%G5656><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> with the oil <S%G1637><s%> of gladness <S%G20><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> fellows <S%G3353><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, in <S%G2596><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> hast laid the foundation <S%G2311><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of thine <S%G4675><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>:

They <S%G846><s%> shall perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5698><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> remainest <S%G1265><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> shall wax old <S%G3822><s%> <S%G5701><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> doth a garment <S%G2440><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> a vesture <S%G4018><s%> shalt thou fold <S%G1667><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1667><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they shall be changed <S%G236><s%> <S%G5691><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> shall <S%G1587><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> fail <S%G1587><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> said he <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5758><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%>, Sit <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5737><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, until <S%G302><s%> <S%G2193><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5632><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> footstool <S%G5286><s%> <S%G4228><s%>?

Are they <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ministering <S%G3010><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, sent forth <S%G649><s%> <S%G5746><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> minister <S%G1248><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> them who shall <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> be heirs of <S%G2816><s%> <S%G5721><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>?
